00020 #include "walk_circle.h"
00021 
00022 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00023 
00024 CircleWalk::CircleWalk(Point2i c, double ra)
00025 {
00026     center = c;
00027     radius = (int)ra;
00028     if (radius >0)
00029         createCirclePoints();
00030 }
00031     
00032 bool CircleWalk::next() {
00033     circlePoints.pop_back();
00034     return !circlePoints.empty();
00035 }
00036     
00037 void CircleWalk::rewind() { 
00038     if (radius >0)
00039         createCirclePoints();
00040 }
00041 
00042 Point2i CircleWalk::getPoint() const { return circlePoints.back(); }
00043 
00044 void CircleWalk::createCirclePoints() {
00045     int xQuadInscribed = (int)(radius / sqrt(2.));
00046     for (int x = 0; x < radius; x++)
00047         for(int y = 0; y <= x; y++)
00048             //the first check condition makes us avoid forwarding calculations
00049             if ( x < xQuadInscribed || (x*x + y*y) < (radius*radius)) {
00050                 circlePoints.push_back(Point2i(center.x + x, center.y + y));
00051                 //simmetric addition of points on the other quadrants
00052                 circlePoints.push_back(Point2i(center.x + x, center.y - y));
00053                 circlePoints.push_back(Point2i(center.x - x, center.y + y));
00054                 circlePoints.push_back(Point2i(center.x - x, center.y - y));
00055             
00056                 //simmetric addition of points on the other otcants
00057                 circlePoints.push_back(Point2i(center.x + y, center.y + x));
00058                 circlePoints.push_back(Point2i(center.x + y, center.y - x));
00059                 circlePoints.push_back(Point2i(center.x - y, center.y + x));
00060                 circlePoints.push_back(Point2i(center.x - y, center.y - x));
00061             }
00062 /*
00063     //old method, non optimized
00064     for (int x = -radius; x < radius; x++)
00065         for(int y = -radius ; y < radius; y++) {
00066             //the first check condition makes us avoid forwarding calculations
00067             if ((abs(x)+abs(y))<radius
00068                     ||(x*x + y*y) < (radius*radius))
00069                 circlePoints.push_back(Point2i(center.x + x, center.y + y));
00070         }
00071 */
00072 }
00073
